org.agilewiki.jactor2.util.durable

Class Durables

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.util.durable.Durables

  • public final class Durables
extends java.lang.Object
    Static methods for accessing durable capabilities.

      • createFacility

        public static Facility createFacility()
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a facility with a factoryLocator that supports all the pre-defined factories.
        Returns:
        A facility whose properties include the factoryLocator.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • createFactoryLocator

        public static FactoryLocator createFactoryLocator(Facility _facility,
                                  java.lang.String _bundleName,
                                  java.lang.String _version,
                                  java.lang.String _location)
                                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a factoryLocator and add it to the facility properties.
        Parameters:
        _facility - A facility.
        _bundleName - The name of the OSGi bundle or an empty string.
        _version - The version of the OSGi bundle or an empty string.
        _location - The location of the OSGi bundle or an empty string.
        Returns:
        The new factoryLocator.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getFactoryLocator

        public static FactoryLocator getFactoryLocator(Reactor _reactor)
        Returns the factoryLocator from the facility's factoryLocator property.
        Parameters:
        _reactor - A processing.
        Returns:
        The factoryLocator for that processing.

      • getFactoryLocator

        public static FactoryLocator getFactoryLocator(Facility _facility)
        Returns the factoryLocator from the facility's factoryLocator property.
        Parameters:
        _facility - A facility.
        Returns:
        The factoryLocator for that facility.

      • registerFactories

        public static void registerFactories(FactoryLocator _factoryLocator)
                              throws FactoryLocatorClosedException
        Register all the pre-defined factories.
        Parameters:
        _factoryLocator - The factoryLocator that will hold the factories.
        Throws:
        FactoryLocatorClosedException

      • registerListFactory

                                throws FactoryLocatorClosedException
        Register a list factory.
        Parameters:
        _factoryLocator - The factoryLocator that will hold the factory.
        _listFactoryName - The new list type.
        _valueFactoryName - The list entry type.

        FactoryLocatorClosedException

                        java.lang.String _unionFactoryName,
                        java.lang.String... _valueFactoryNames)
                                 throws FactoryLocatorClosedException
        Register the factory of a union.
        Parameters:
        _factoryLocator - The factoryLocator that will hold the factory.
        _unionFactoryName - The new union type.
        _valueFactoryNames - The types of the possible values of the union.

        FactoryLocatorClosedException

      • registerAppFactory

        public static void registerAppFactory(FactoryLocator _factoryLocator,
                      java.lang.Class<?> _appClass,
                      java.lang.String _appFactoryName,
                      java.lang.String... _valueFactoryNames)
                               throws FactoryLocatorClosedException
        Register the factory of a serializable application.
        Parameters:
        _factoryLocator - The factoryLocator that will hold the factory.
        _appClass - The application class.
        _appFactoryName - The application type.
        _valueFactoryNames - The types of the durable values of the application.
        Throws:
        FactoryLocatorClosedException

        Parameters:
        _factoryLocator - The factoryLocator.
        _factoryName - The type of object to be created.

      • newSerializable

        public static JASerializable newSerializable(FactoryLocator _factoryLocator,
                             java.lang.String _factoryName,
                             Reactor _reactor,
                             Ancestor _parent)
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a new serializable object.
        Parameters:
        _factoryLocator - The factoryLocator.
        _factoryName - The type of object to be created.
        _reactor - The processing to be used by the new object.
        _parent - The dependency to be injected, or null.
        Returns:
        A new serializable object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

                             java.lang.String _factoryName,
                             Facility _facility)
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a new serializable object and a new processing to be used by that serializable object.
        Parameters:
        _factoryLocator - The factoryLocator.
        _factoryName - The type of object to be created.
        _facility - The facility to be used to create the new processing.

        A new serializable object.

        java.lang.Exception

                             java.lang.String _factoryName)
                                      throws java.lang.Exception

        Parameters:
        _factoryName - The type of object to be created.

        Returns:
        A new serializable object.

        java.lang.Exception
